document_data.name: Messanth
document_data.mainbody: '''Messanth''' was a [[bronze dragon]] turned [[shadow dragon]] in [[Szith Morcane]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History:
The Archmage of Szith Morcane, [[Solom Ned'razak]], at one point captured the bronze dragon Messanth{{Cite adventurers league/Szith Morcane Unbound|6}} and imprisoned him inside a pocket of [[Shadowfell]]. The shadow energies changed Messanth into a shadow dragon that attacked anything he saw.

In the {{YearlinkName|1486}}, the [[Order of the Gauntlet]] asked adventurers affiliated with them to find Messanth.{{Cite adventurers league/Szith Morcane Unbound|19}}
document_data.Relationships: Messanth had good dealings with the Order of the Gauntlet.
